contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Part 9 - You Won't Believe Who Came to Church

fields.notesFormatted:
Who? 1 Corinthians 6:9-11

  1. A group of spiritual half-breeds called Samaritans.

    Acts 1:8

    Acts 8:1-25

  2. A defiled Ethiopian eunuch.

    Acts 8:26-40

    Deuteronomy 23:1

    Romans 8:13-14

  3. The Church's #1 enemy; a guy named Saul.

    Acts 9:1-31

  4. A gentile pig named Cornelius.

We must learn:

  1. If we hide in our holy huddles - God will break them up.

    Acts 1:8

    Acts 8:1-4

  2. Never treat God's enemy as an enemy.

    2 Timothy 2:24-26

  3. Reach out to broken people & you'll find beautiful people.
